org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.fxg.dom

Interface IScalableGradientNode

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LinearGradientFillNode, LinearGradientStrokeNode, RadialGradientFillNode, RadialGradientStrokeNode

    public interface IScalableGradientNode

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MatrixNode getMatrixNode() 
      double getRotation() 
      double getScaleX() 
      double getScaleY() 
      double getX() 
      double getY() 
      boolean isLinear() 

    • Method Detail

      • getX

        double getX()
        Returns:
        The horizontal distance to translate the gradient.

      • getY

        double getY()
        Returns:
        The vertical distance to translate the gradient.

      • getScaleX

        double getScaleX()
        Returns:
        The horizontal distance of the unrotated gradient (that will be compared to the target's width to calculate a scale ratio). Note this is different from a shape transform scale.

      • getScaleY

        double getScaleY()
        Returns:
        The horizontal distance of the unrotated gradient (that will be compared to the target's width to calculate a scale ratio). Note this is different from a shape transform scale.

      • getRotation

        double getRotation()
        Returns:
        The clockwise rotation angle in degrees.

      • getMatrixNode

        MatrixNode getMatrixNode()
        Returns:
        A pre-calculated matrix to be used instead of the individual transform properties.

      • isLinear

        boolean isLinear()
        Returns:
        true if this gradient is linear.
